sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Box, Typography, Table, TableBody, TableRow, TableCell, TableContainer, TableHead, Paper, Button, IconButton, } from "@mui/material"; import AddIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Add"; import RemoveIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Remove"; const TasksTab = () => { const [tasks, setTasks] = useState([ { id: 1, task: "Project 1 (Chung) - HK 2024.1", status: "RUNNING", createdBy: "admin", createdAt: "2024-09-22 07:33:10", timeStart: "2024-09-22 08:00:00", timeEnd: "2024-09-22 16:00:00", assignTo: "Nguyễn Văn A", }, { id: 2, task: "C_BASIC_STACK", status: "COMPLETED", createdBy: "tung.nguyenviet", createdAt: "2023-10-26 05:56:49", timeStart: "2023-10-26 06:00:00", timeEnd: "2023-10-26 18:00:00", assignTo: "Trần Thị B", }, ]); return ( Danh Sách Công Việc Task Status Created By Created At Time Start Time End Assign To {tasks.map((task) => ( {task.task} {task.status} {task.createdBy} {task.createdAt} {task.timeStart} {task.timeEnd} {task.assignTo} ))}
); }; export default TasksTab;
